description: In this Python course, we will delve into one of the fundamental data structures in Python: Lists. Lists are versatile and commonly used containers that allow you to store collections of items, such as numbers, strings, or even other lists. Throughout this course, we will explore the basics of creating, modifying, and working with lists. To get started, we have provided you with a set of tasks that will help you grasp the essentials of working with lists.
